select
from shebeishenqing where shenqingren = #{shenqingren,jdbcType=VARCHAR} limit 0,1

select count(*) from shebeishenqing where 1=1 and bianhao like concat('%',#{bianhao,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and shebeimingcheng like concat('%',#{shebeimingcheng,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and shenqingshuliang >= concat('',#{shenqingshuliang1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'') and shenqingshuliang <= concat('',#{shenqingshuliang2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'') and shenqingyuanyin like concat('%',#{shenqingyuanyin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and jujueyuanyin like concat('%',#{jujueyuanyin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and beizhu like concat('%',#{beizhu,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and shenqingbumen like concat('%',#{shenqingbumen,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and shenqingren like concat('%',#{shenqingren,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and issh like concat('%',#{issh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')

select from shebeishenqing where 1=1
and shenqingren =#{shenqingren}

select from shebeishenqing where 1=1 and bianhao like concat('%',#{bianhao,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and shebeimingcheng like concat('%',#{shebeimingcheng,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and shenqingshuliang >= concat('',#{shenqingshuliang1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'') and shenqingshuliang <= concat('',#{shenqingshuliang2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'') and shenqingyuanyin like concat('%',#{shenqingyuanyin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and jujueyuanyin like concat('%',#{jujueyuanyin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and beizhu like concat('%',#{beizhu,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and shenqingbumen like concat('%',#{shenqingbumen,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and shenqingren like concat('%',#{shenqingren,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and issh like concat('%',#{issh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') order by id desc
limit #{pageno},#{pageSize}

bianhao, shebeimingcheng, shenqingshuliang, shenqingyuanyin, jujueyuanyin, beizhu, shenqingbumen, shenqingren,
